casebody.data:
No. 445. Howe Scale Company of 1886 et al. Petitioners, v. Wyckoff, Seamans & Benedict. January 11, 1904. Mr. Edmund Wetmore and Mr. Henry D. Donnelly for cross-petitioner. Mr. Austen G. Fox, Mr. James H. Peirce, Mr. George.P. Fisher, Jr., and Mr. Wm. Henry Dennis for cross-respondent

Petition for cross-writ of certiorari granted.,
